name: cards-company
description: Grid of company cards with logos, titles, subtitles, descriptions, and website links

usage.purpose: Display company information in a structured grid layout
usage.contentModel: Container block with multiple rows, each containing company logo (image) and company info (rich text with title, subtitle, description, and link)

visualCharacteristics.layout: Responsive grid (4 columns on desktop, 1 column on mobile)
visualCharacteristics.cardStructure: Company logo at top (in gray background area), content area with title/subtitle/description, footer with website link
visualCharacteristics.styling: White cards with subtle border and shadow, hover effect
